document_data.name: Boon Silverhoarde
document_data.Description: He hailed from a wealthy dwarven family noted for their unusual skill at metallurgy. Boon was reddish-brown of hair and fair of skin, clad himself in gilded armor, and wore a lengthy red cape.
document_data.Personality: Although he shared his family's interest in metallurgy, Boon devoted himself to the service of Grumbar and the elemental forces of [[Earth (element)|earth]].
document_data.Abilities: Boon was able to sense the presence of precious metals within 60 feet (18.2 meters).
document_data.Possessions: He owned a [[magic]]al ''[[shield]] +1'' and a ''[[plate mail of etherealness]]''.
